sqlMap.select: select cont_title from view_record where USERS_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.insert: MERGE INTO VIEW_RECORD A USING DUAL ON(A.CONT_TITLE = #cont_title# and A.USERS_ID = #users_id#) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (VIEW_NO, VIEW_DT, USERS_ID, CONT_TITLE) VALUES (RECORD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, sysdate, #users_id#, #cont_title#)
sqlMap.select: select ROWNUM AS view_no ,b.CONT_POSTER as cont_poster ,a.CONT_TITLE as cont_title from view_record a join content b on a.cont_title = b.cont_title where VIEW_RECORD_DEL_KEY = '1' and users_id=#users_id#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE VIEW_RECORD SET VIEW_RECORD_DEL_DT=SYSDATE, VIEW_RECORD_DEL_KEY = '0' WHERE USERS_ID = #users_id# and cont_title=#cont_title#
